### TT, Revisited

You're gaining more skills each week, so why not go back to an early assignment and put your new knowledge to work. If you choose this option we'll expect to see a substantial improvement along with some narrative around what you know now that enabled you to make improvements. This must be more than changing the font, color, etc. The spirit of this option is that you are now able to make the plot you could only imagine or barely approach in one of the early weeks. 

You should also complete the code review portion of the assignment from TT Week 8 tweets.

### BYOD

You can bring your own data for the first part of the assignment (exploration), but please find a community example from TT Week 8 for the second part.
